page.title: 05Mr.Harry Runyard...Verger.
page.content: MR. Runyard was born in Wool. His family have had connections with Wool since the 1700's. On May 18th 1985 he celebrated 50 years as Verger of Holy Rood Church, Wool. He carries on a family tradition, for his father, mother, grandfather, and great_grandfather were also Vergers _ making a total of 150 years of service to the church. During the 1939 _ 45 war Mr.Runyard served in the Royal Navy, so his mother held the Office of Verger while he was away. To celebrate Harry's Golden Anniversary there was a service of thanksgiving in the church followed by a party in the school hall given by the parishioners. Mr Runyard was presented with a framed manuscript which recorded his service.
